parameters.name: DeleteMarkMissParam
parameters.description: The alert handling rule that you want to delete.

parameters.name: From
parameters.description: The ID of the request source. Set the value to **sas**.

parameters.name: InsertMarkMissParam
parameters.description: The alert handling that you want to add.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
The language of the content within the request and response. Default value: **zh**. Valid values:

*   **zh**: Chinese
*   **en**: English

parameters.name: SourceIp
parameters.description: The source IP address of the request. You do not need to specify this parameter. It is automatically obtained by the system.
